*Data Scientist, Uptick Inc, филиал в Санкт-Петербурге*
As the Data Scientist, you will work closely with our machine learning team, development team and customer implementation team to characterize datasets, transform the data and extract features from the data. You will run Uptick machine learning models and evaluate, analyze and improve results.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
analyze datasets, 
consolidate various internal and external data sources into formats and aggregations suitable for internal analysis and machine learning,
сharacterize customer data, 
run Uptick machine learning models and improve results,
work closely with several internal engineering teams.

REQUIRED SKILLS
Strong knowledge and coding skills in SQL
Skilled in developing high performing code on schedule
Strong problem solver and ability to work in a fast-paced environment and make pragmatic engineering decisions in a short amount of time
Strong team skills, ability to interface with multiple teams and contribute to different areas as needed
Coding in programming languages such as Python
Intermediate English (good spoken skills - ability to talk with native speakers)

Stack:  ASP .NET C#, .NET Core, Web API, AWS, Event Driven Architecture, PostgreSQL, Docker.

Job Type
    Full-Time
Location
    Seattle, WA
Salary: Competitive
Description

    About the role:

    Zillow is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join a growing world-class data science group dedicated to excellence. As a data scientist you will be a member of a team that is passionate about our product. You’ll collaborate with other experienced Data Scientists and leverage your experience to improve data science products while gaining tremendous experience with machine learning, statistics and big data problems.

        Create predictive models for Zestimates, Rent Zestimates, Home Indices.
        Create personalized recommendation models that affect all of our core product flows.
        Improve relevance ranking for search.
        Propose and build user segmentation models that give the company insight into our customers.
        Collaborate with software developers to put predictive models in production.


    About the team:

    Our Data Science & Engineering Team builds prediction models and big data systems for Zestimates, our personalization engines, housing indices, fraud detection, and many other cutting-edge analytic products that power Zillow’s industry leading online marketplace. This role focuses on a host of personalization, recommendation and user understanding initiatives designed to make the product tailored to every user’s needs. The work we do is at the core of Zillow’s mission to empower the consumer and provide them with the tools to make informed decisions.


    Who are you?

        4+ years of experience in a quantitative or technical field, including experience working with very large data sets.
        Experience with machine learning applied to big data; strong data science internships also considered.
        A graduate degree (MS or PhD) from a premier university in a Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Operations Research or related discipline.
        Strong foundation in statistical inference, machine learning and/or graph theory.
        Expertise with the data analysis languages Python and/or R.
        Knowledge of machine-learning/computational packages (numpy, scipy, pandas, scikit-learn)
        Proficiency with SQL, knowledge of Spark


    Get to know us

    Zillow Group is the leading real estate and rental marketplace dedicated to empowering consumers with data, inspiration, and knowledge around the place they call home. We connect consumers with local professionals who can help them make landmark decisions.

    You’ll work in an informal, fun, harmonious atmosphere with a team of strong, smart, self-starters like yourself with terabytes of data at your fingertips. We are a community at Zillow Group, we collaborate in small teams to tackle big ideas. You will have an impact on what we do and how we do it. Named one of the best places to work by Glassdoor and Seattle Business Magazine, Zillow is a place where you can innovate and grow.

    Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law.
     
<https://www.zillow.com/jobs/openings?j=oFlH3fwu>

text: <@U043ZLY35> мопед не твой?

<@U3Z5KPTRQ> блин, чувак) ты прав! если ты хочешь со мно обсудить эту тему, гоу в личку :wink: хотя я тут редко бываю. а писать на широкую публику я пока не готова, ребят сильно задел мой давншний пост с ваканией из какой-то не помню как называлась конторой, где я сказала, что профессионалу по идее должно быть все равно на кого работать, а в приортете 1)задача ну и 2) прайс и сказала, что “этому меня научили в компании, где многие мечтают работать“. Тут был взрыв негатива. Я кст тут подумала над этим утверждением. В Яндексе меня все-таки учили одинаково хорошо работать со всеми заказчиками внутри конторы, и в этом смысле я готова признать несостоятельность данного утверждения. То есть да, название конторы, её история и иные факты влияют. (Пусть это останется в истории)
